title: What You'll Get Inside She Moves
items: Expert-led workouts, safe for pelvic floor, C-section, prolapse & diastasis
Short sessions (5–20 minutes) that fit into nap times and messy mum life
Structured programs for every stage: pregnancy → postpartum → beyond
Real, supportive community, because you don't have to do this alone
No mirrors, no pressure, just safe, confidence-building movement
